contentList.content: Oath of Retribution
You are an instrument of retribution against those who dare defy the laws of the divine, a crusader judging and punishing the wicked.
Oath of Holiness
You are a sacred knight dedicated to revitalizing your comrades, invoking the power of the Light to protect and to heal.
Oath of Protection
You are an ardent defender of the Light, using holy magic to shield yourself and defend allies from attackers.
Oath Spells
Choose spells that will be always prepared.
Templar's Verdict
Unleash a powerful weapon strike that damages a creature from a distance for addional Radiant damage.
Divine Storm
Unleash a whirl of divine energy, making a weapon attack against nearby enemies for additional Radiant damage.
Avenging Wrath

Call upon the Light and become an avatar of retribution, giving you bonus Radiant damage and healing equal to your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bfonus</LSTag> and reducing the number you need to roll a critical hit by 1.

You deal an additional <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">[1]</LSTag>, restore an additional <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">[2]</LSTag> health, and the number you need to roll a critical hit is reduced by 1.
Divine Purpose

Your attacks and spells in combat have a 20% chance to make your next <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ChannelOath">Channel Oath</LSTag> ability not expend any <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ChannelOath">Channel Oath</LSTag> charges.
Your next <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ChannelOath">Channel Oath</LSTag> ability will not expend any <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ChannelOath">Channel Oath</LSTag> charges.

<LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hits</LSTag> against <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PARALYZED">Paralyzed</LSTag> enemies will only trigger this Once per <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">Long Rest</LSTag>.
Holy Shock
Trigger [1] burst(s) of Light on a creature, healing an ally or dealing Radiant damage to an enemy.
Trigger [1] burst(s) of Light on a creature, healing them.
Trigger [1] burst(s) of Light on a creature, damaging them.
Triggers an additonal burst per level.
Light of Dawn
Unleash a wave of Holy energy, healing allies in a cone in front of you.
You gain the ability to cast <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Smite_Divine">Divine Smite</LSTag> by expending <LSTag Tooltip="SpellSlot">spell slots</LSTag>.
Divine Power
Choose how you will unleash divine might upon your foes.
Improved Divine Power
Choose how you will further unleash divine might upon your foes.
Holy Power

Your maximum number of <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ChannelOath">Channel Oath Charges</LSTag> becomes equal to your maximum number of <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="LayOnHandsCharge">Lay on Hands Charges</LSTag>.
Aura of Retribution
If one of your allies within [1] dies or falls unconscious, you gain [2] turns of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="AVENGING_WRATH">Avenging Wrath</LSTag>.
If you die or fall unconscious, the spellcaster gains [1] turns of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="AVENGING_WRATH">Avenging Wrath</LSTag>.
Judgement

Judge a creature for [1] turns, applying an effect of your choice. Your <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ChannelOath">Channel Oath</LSTag> abilities have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> against Judged creatures.
<LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ChannelOath">Channel Oath</LSTag> abilities have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> against this creature.
Judgement of Light
Judge a creature for [1] turns, causing attacks against them to heal the attacker based on their <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag>.

Attackers are healed based on their <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag>. <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ChannelOath">Channel Oath</LSTag> abilities have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> against this creature.
Judgement of Justice
Judge a creature for [1] turns, slowing their movement speed by [2] and possibly <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FRIGHTENED">frightening</LSTag> them for [3] turns.
Movement speed reduced by [1]. <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ChannelOath">Channel Oath</LSTag> abilities have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> against this creature.
Judgement of Wisdom
Judge a creature for [1] turns, causing <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hits</LSTag> against them to replenish a Level 1 <LSTag Tooltip="SpellSlot">spell slot</LSTag> for the attacker.

Being <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critically Hit</LSTag> will replenish a Level 1 <LSTag Tooltip="SpellSlot">spell slot</LSTag> for the attacker. <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ChannelOath">Channel Oath</LSTag> abilities have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> against this creature.
Does not have <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> at close range.
Benefits from <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="ExtraAttack">Extra Attack</LSTag>.
Does not have <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> at close range. Benefits from <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="ExtraAttack">Extra Attack</LSTag>.
Crusader Strike
Strike a creature for bonus Radiant damage.
Word of Glory
Call down the Light to heal a character.
Infusion of Light

Spend 1 <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="LayOnHandsCharge">Lay on Hands Charge</LSTag> to make your next <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ChannelOath">Channel Oath</LSTag> ability that can restore hit points have maximized healing and damage.
Your next <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ChannelOath">Channel Oath</LSTag> ability that can restore hit points has maximized healing and damage.
Avenger's Shield
Hurl your shield, causing a small explosion of Radiant damage that breaks <LSTag Tooltip="Concentration">concentration</LSTag> against enemies.
Your shield gains the <LSTag Tooltip="Thrown">Thrown</LSTag> property, dealing [1] when thrown and automatically returning to you.
Shield of the Righteous

Slam enemies in front of you with your shield, dealing Radiant damage and knocking them <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag>. For the next [1] turns, you gain a bonus to your <LSTag Tooltip="ArmorClass">Armour Class</LSTag> equal to your Charisma <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Modifier</LSTag>.
You gain a bonus to your <LSTag Tooltip="ArmorClass">Armour Class</LSTag> equal to your Charisma <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Modifier</LSTag>.
Counts as an Unarmed Attack.
Guardian of Ancient Kings
Empowers you with the spirit of ancient kings, granting <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to all damage for [1] turns.
<LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistant</LSTag> to all damage.
Grand Crusader
You restore 1 <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ChannelOath">Channel Oath Charge</LSTag> whenever an enemy critically misses you in combat.
Blessing of Freedom

Snap an ally out of any <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="STUNNED">Stun</LSTag>. <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DIFFICULT_TERRAIN">Difficult Terrain</LSTag> can't slow them down, and they can't be magically <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PARALYZED">Paralysed</LSTag> or <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="RESTRAINED">Restrained</LSTag> for [1] turns.
Divine Shield
Become <LSTag Tooltip="Immune">Immune</LSTag> to all damage for [1] turns.
Forbearance
Prevents certain Paladin effects from happening again.

Applies <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FORBEARANCE">Forbearance</LSTag> for [1] turns, preventing any Paladin ability that applies <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FORBEARANCE">Forbearance</LSTag> from happening again on the target.
Blessing of Spellwarding
Make a creature <LSTag Tooltip="Immune">Immune</LSTag> to all damage that is not Bludgeoning, Piercing, or Slashing for [1] turns.
Creature is <LSTag Tooltip="Immune">Immune</LSTag> to all damage that is not Bludgeoning, Piercing, or Slashing.
Blessing of Protection
Make a creature <LSTag Tooltip="Immune">Immune</LSTag> to all Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing damage for [1] turns.
Creature is <LSTag Tooltip="Immune">Immune</LSTag> to all Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing damage.
Hammer of Wrath
Only usable against creatures below [1] hit points, or during <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="AVENGING_WRATH">Avenging Wrath</LSTag>.
Hammer of Justice
Attempt to <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="STUNNED">Stun</LSTag> a creature.
Exorcism
This spell can't miss againt Fiends and Undead, and they always take maximum damage.
Art of War

After you land a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag> against an enemy, your next <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Exorcism">Exorcism</LSTag> will cost an <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="BonusActionPoint">Bonus Action</LSTag> instead of an <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ActionPoint">Action</LSTag> and not expend a <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ChannelOath">Channel Oath Charge</LSTag>.

Your next <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Exorcism">Exorcism</LSTag> costs a <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="BonusActionPoint">Bonus Action</LSTag> instead of an <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ActionPoint">Action</LSTag> and will not expend a <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ChannelOath">Channel Oath Charge</LSTag>.
Does not consume any <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ChannelOath">Channel Oath charges</LSTag>.
